2025-12-27T17:00:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-27T17:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

2025-12-28T14:31:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-12-28T14:31:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

2025-12-29T07:14:00.CONTENT_EN: Traffic is busy at Man Kam To Road northbound near Kong Nga Po Road. Motorists are encouraged to remain tolerant. Cross-boundary public transport services to and from Man Kam To Control Point may be affected and passenger waiting time may be longer. Passengers are advised to be patient.
2025-12-29T07:14:00.CONTENT_CN: 文錦渡路北行近缸瓦甫路交通繁忙，駕駛人士請保持忍讓。來往文錦渡管制站的跨境公共運輸服務或會受到影響，乘客候車時間或會延長，請耐心等候。

2025-12-29T14:16:00.CONTENT_EN: Traffic at Man Kam To Road northbound near Kong Nga Po Road has resumed normal. Cross-boundary public transport services to and from Man Kam To Control Point has resumed.
2025-12-29T14:16:00.CONTENT_CN: 文錦渡路北行近缸瓦甫路的交通已恢復正常，來往文錦渡管制站的跨境公共運輸服務已恢復正常。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 機場管理局 晚間繁忙時段

2025-12-23T17:30:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the high passenger traffic during the holiday season, all long-term parking spaces for private vehicle and light goods vehicle at Hong Kong International Airport are fully occupied. Travellers are recommended to take public transport when travelling to the airport to avoid any unnecessary delays.
2025-12-23T17:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於假期人流暢旺，香港國際機場所有私家車及輕型客貨車長期停車位已全部泊滿，建議旅客使用公共交通工具前往機場，以免不必要的延誤。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: MTR Train service enhancement during New Year
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 港鐵新年期間加強服務

2025-12-30T12:36:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that to facilitate travel needs, train services will be enhanced with more frequent trips on several rail lines during different periods from now until 4 January. 

New Year's Eve (31 December)
Overnight service:
◦All local lines (except the Airport Express, Disneyland Resort Line and journeys to or from Lo Wu and Lok Ma Chau stations on the East Rail Line)
◦7 Light Rail routes 505, 507, 610, 614P, 615P, 751 and 706

Extended service hours:
◦East Rail Line service to/from Lo Wu (to/from Lok Ma Chau will not be extended)
◦Disneyland Resort Line
◦Bus route 506, K51 and K54A

The last Airport Express will depart from AsiaWorld-Expo on:
◦31 December: 1:30am the next day
◦1 January: 1:00am the next day

Please refer to MTRCL's website for more information. 

Crowd management measures may be implemented in stations when necessary.
2025-12-30T12:36:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，為方便大家外出，即日至1月4日期間，多條本地鐵路綫於不同時段加密班次，加強列車服務。

除夕夜（12月31日)
通宵行駛：
◦本地鐵路綫（不包括機場快綫、迪士尼綫及東鐵綫往返羅湖及落馬洲站)
◦7條輕鐵路綫505、507、610、614P、615P、751及706

延長服務時間：
◦東鐵綫往返羅湖站（往返落馬洲站不會延長服務）
◦迪士尼綫
◦3條巴士綫506、K51及K54A

機場快綫博覽館站尾班車亦會延後：
◦12月31日：延至翌日凌晨01:30開出
◦1月1日：延至翌日凌晨01:00開出

詳情請參閲港鐵網頁。

部分車站在人多時或會實施客流管理措施。
